content.detailedDescription:
We are staying at the admiral inn in myrtle beach. last night at about 30 to 35 degrees over the ocean, i saw an orange light appear in the sky for just a few seconds. when it faded two more of these lights appeared on either side of where the original was. at the time i attributed the on/off to possible clouds. i really think they were lower than any cloud cover would have been. about 10 minutes later, they re-appeared suddenly farther north along the coast. after a few seconds they were gone.

1. standing on my balcony
2. sudden bright light
3.Never have seen anything like it
5. during was holy f..K what is that? after just confusion trying to explain it as anything.

my wife was on the balcony with me and looked uo where i was pointing. she missed the original light but saw the two when it faded and the one farther north.
content.summary: Orange lights in the sky over ocean.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside in my front yard watching the sky because there was an impressive full moon that night when i saw a shooting star,i watched as the shooting star was descending towards the earth when it suddenly did a 180 and ascended into the sky and disappeared. the "shooting star" or whatever it was it didnt decelerate, or turn it just descended, then ascended! what was it??!!!
content.summary: Shooting star falling towards the earth that suddenly ascends w/o decelerating into the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from the store with my brothers. i was arround 14 years old the time.We was at a corner from the street my house was on. i looked up and saw two glowing objects heading southwest. they slowed down then headed in the opposite direction. it made no turns at all. i was shock because i knew it could not be a a plane of helicopter. it was like a car driving forward the slowing down to back up. i turned my head to show my brothers but as they was about to look the two objects were gone. it was my second ufo sighting since i was little.
content.summary: Two round shaped lights heading southwest the stop instantly and head in the othe direction

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up around 2:40am and went outside to have a smoke, looking east i observed a extremely bright amber color light behind the trees at a distant. i observed it for closed to 7 minutes when it started heading westbound as it moved it seemed to dip down then go back up a little higher, it kept moving when all of the sudden a plane flew by between the object and my stand point. 

the unkown craft then all the sudden change from a amber ball and seemed to mimick the aircraft passing by, the unknown craft then started heading my way. (note: i have seen plenty planes in my life to know, that the sudden change of direction for this craft wasn't typical of a jet liner) anyhow it headed my way and zoomed just about 1000ft just a few houses short of where i was and headed north/west. i was able to video table a good 5 minutes of the sighting but i dont have a source at the moment to upload my video. i was using a cannon elura, which is a older model video camera.
content.summary: Triangular fire-ball... hovering then mimicks a plane

content.detailedDescription:
Early in the morning, around 4 a.M., myself, and two friends were standing in a rural driveway chating after we finished some home repair.  at one point in our conversation i was relating to one friend how i have researched so much u.F.O. reports, and would love to see one(in which i had never).As soon as i had finished saying that i noticed a bright orange object, seen though a treetop, and at that point i said, "what the hell is that", as i point up twords the orb of orange light.  at that point immediatly the object intensafied to a brighter, sustaind glow. as soon as my two friends saw the object, i was already moving away from the tree to get a clearer view.  the object was in the western sky at about a 45 degree angle, i was standing near maple island log homes, on maple island rd. once in the clear i could see the orb of light dim to almost invisable with the only thing i could see was a dark orange glow with a darker center. very faintly still, it changed direction from heading twords us to traveling sw, within 5 seconds it was out of view.
   i was immeditly emotional, with water welling in my eyes and a heavy feeling in my chest, and i got shaky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Blimp,   Circle,   Disc,   Egg,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Unknown
content.summary: Orange-orb u.F.O.

content.detailedDescription: I was throwing trash away ( glamorous i know) from my bedroom into the kitchen. all the lights were off and the blinds were open, and i saw what i thought was a military plane, so i looked again, and saw that it was getting dimmer, then brighter, then turning into a disk shape. ( this is looking south from north. towards the seattle metro area.) it started moving left ( or east) and disappeared. another one showed up shortly after out of no where, and another appeared after that, they would get dim, then bright, then turn into orange 'saturn shapes'. after that, they would turn into a dim ball again, and disappear, then one would reappear. after there was one, another would appear, so there were 2, then they both just disappeared.
content.summary: It would be a dim cirlce, then bright then 'saturn like', back to a cirlce

content.detailedDescription: My fiance went outside to let the dog out, and immediately flagged me over to come see what was in the sky. it was extremely bright, and looked somewhat like a star, but only because it stayed in a constant position. it flashed at a constant rate, and looked to have a red and white flashing light. after about 10 minutes of just staring at it in awe and wondering if we were crazy, we saw an airplane fly right into its direction. a few moments later, we saw another encounter with another airplane. this time, it got much closer to the ufo (for lack of better terms) but still appeared to keep a good distance between the two. after several more minutes, the hovering object finally moved for the first time (that we saw) and again, hovered again, only this time a few miles over. the air traffic at this time became very odd to us, and we had seen 4-5 airplanes in the area. we couldn't believe what we were seeing, and were hesitant to make phone calls in fear of sounding insane, so i guess this was our best option. just hoping someone else saw what we did!!
content.summary: Flashing hovering lights

content.detailedDescription: I took my dogs for a walk a little before 10pm.  we drove to an undeveloped subdivision in marana.  there are no lights, except in the distance, and the moon was bright enough to see the roadway clearly.  there were no clouds.  i was admiring the starry night when a light came on slowly in the west.  the light glowed a dull yellow orange glow, turned off, and an identical  second light appeared,as it went off, a third orange light came on.  the pattern seemed triangular, as if the lights were separate corners of a single object, and not a single light moving along.  i had the impression of a large object quite a distance away (a mile or more), moving slowly, about 20 degrees above the horizon.  i waited for the lights to blink on a second time, but there was nothing else.  the whole sighting lastedonly a few seconds.  i see lots of planes passing over at night, and the lights appeared nothing like the lights on planes.  however, the lights did appear to be in the direction of a small airport, so it can't be ruled out.  i would not report this short duration event, but i am curious whether anyone else may have seen the same thing.
content.summary: Dull orange lights flash in sequence

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking to the cashier with my mother, my mom started to buy the flowers for our yard the cashier said to my mom you need two pots of the flowers because they all come together. so my mom goes to get the flowers as i stand 2 feet away from the cashier and i see a cessna plane cause i know my aircraft,the cessna goes over my head to the east and it goes straight and then it makes a left turn a few seconds later it turns right to the airport and the airport was not far from where it was turning and as it made a same turn,i saw something a few inches away from the plane like it was a plane but it was not a plane it was a little black circler object moving south right next to the plane and then it disappears. i was excited when i saw it,it was my third sighting of a ufo it was fun.
content.summary: Ufo close by a cessna plane

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside talking with friends and noticed a strange bright light in the sky. at first it looked like a plane, but i noticed it was not moving at all, and much brighter than other planes i often see flying lower in the sky.  i then saw two planes flying at the same time as this bright light that was not moving.  
i was facing towards the east, high in the night sky i observed a light, brighter than a plane. i knew it was strange, so i called my mom to have her view it from our balcony at home, too.  it was stationary for about 5 minutes, in the last minute of visability it seemed to move upward rather quickly. then i could no longer view it through the clouds it seemed to rise higher up into.
content.summary: Strange bright light.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the balcony of springs towers ocean front in north myrtle beach on my laptop. i was downloading a program and smoking a cigarette at the same time. i sat back in my chair and when  i looked up i saw 4 bright orange lights but they all lit up one by one. i stood up to knock on the balcony door to alert my brothers while looks at the objects the entire time and they started to go off same way they came on, one by one. about 15-20mins later at 10:00pm - 10:05pm i heard loud engine noise in the sky over the ocean that sounded like aircraft. i continued to hear them for another 10 mins until i saw two small but loud aircraft flying torwards the part of the ocean front where i saw the orange ufo's. they turned and started flying back where they came from but went off in formation inland over the city. it's now 10:19pm and you can still hear them off and on.
content.summary: Four bright lights in circle shapes and orange in color

content.detailedDescription: Scanning cams and media i caught these i could not explain away.
content.summary: Scanning cams and media i caught these i could not explain away.

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding in the back seat of a car.
then, all of a sudden, out of no where a huge, very close, very low flying saucer appeared in front of us, but it was off to the side.
there were two large black saucer plates that were rotating clockwise.
in between the plates were green rotating letters or glyphs that was spinning counter clockwise.
i still remember one glyph and it looked like a backwards number seven with a sideways colon on top.
i was very calm, but i also felt excited.
it stayed in place for about three or four seconds then it took off so fast it left a quick streak of black, green, black. it seemed like something you would see in a science fiction movie.
when it took off, it made a distinct whistling noise.
i was the only witness of the three in the vehicle as the two in the front seat were paying attention to the road.
content.summary: Close low flying u.F.O

content.detailedDescription:
On my way home on march 15 (2009), i spotted what i thought was an aircraft lining up for approach for landing at your airport between 8-8:30pm.  the aircraft and i were heading in opposite directions - i was heading west on route 22 away from the airport, while the aircraft was heading east toward the airport.  
 
as i got closer toward the object, it appeared the object was moving very slowly since it seemed to be taking quite some time to get to the airport.  however, as i got closer to the route 309 interchange, i noticed the aircraft was hovering without sound, roughly 200 feet up and within 100 yards west of route 309 north exit near route 22.  it was definitely not a helicopter.  
 
were there any other reports regarding this strange object?
content.summary: Plane-like shape similar to space shuttle with bright square white lights along side, similar to windows on a plane, triangular bottom

content.detailedDescription:
We were camping at the pine creek campsite near bayfield, co, where two of our party (of four) had previously witnessed ufos/strange lights in the sky. at the moment it appeared we were actually watching the sky for any strange objects - as well as just looking at the stars. i will admit that we were there to search for ufo's, but also that my self-proclaimed role for the night was the skeptic. it's not that i don't believe, but that i wanted to rule out all other possibilities. 

the craft appeared in the gap between two peaks, which is slightly west of true north. it caught my eye because it was so excessively bright and because a member of our party yelled out to get our attention. my first thought was that it was coming from an entirely different direction that any other object (i'd already determined what appeared to be the flight paths of planes). planes generally traveled from northeast to southwest and visa versa (in line with denver), but this was totally different. 

initially, it looked like a single, white light ��� an excessively bright light, in fact. it���s hard to explain, but it was really, really bright  - way brighter than any other plane or star. however, as it drew closer the white light seemed to separate into three smaller white lights in a perfect line with a red light hovering above it. presumably, this was the top of the craft as it seemed to be descending.

the truly interesting thing about this craft was that it was incredibly low ��� perhaps even 500 feet or less above our heads. it flew directly overhead and seemed to bank slightly before disappearing into the south - perhaps over vallecito reservoir. i wasn't quite scared - more awestruck actually, but i did have the presence of mind to attempt to take two photographs, neither of which showed anything distinct. 

as it passed overhead and banked it became clear that this was a diamond-shaped craft. small lights lined all four sides, delineating the diamond shape and showing the outline of the craft. from our vantage point we could see the underside of the thing which seemed to have four or five red lights (one at each corner and one in the center) and a series of three or four round white lights in the front and four slit-like lights toward the back. 

it moved slowly and took about thirty seconds to travel across the sky. it made a low, rumbling roar, but did not resemble a plane in any other way. i have no idea how large it was, but it seemed pretty big ��� at least as big as a jet, maybe bigger. also, to be perfectly honest, we were standing next to a creek which was sending out a low, rumbling roar, so i cannot really attest to how loud it was. 

about an hour and one-half later, another craft appeared from the same general area and traveled the same general path. it seemed exactly the same: appearing as an extraordinarily bright single white light and then showing us the three white lights and single red light as it drew near.  as before it was very low. once again there were small, white lights around the perimeter, three or four white lights at the front and three slit-like lights in the back. the only difference was that the five lights at the corners were green and not red.

note: this object was not on the same flight path as any of the planes that we had observed in the sky, and, most importantly, it was far, far lower. i did a bit of research and discovered that there are nearby airports that could support a craft of that size. also, for the record, it was not the stealth. i've seen the stealth at close range and it looked nothing like this. 

there were also lights and orbs and other "visual anomalies" in the sky that night and those will be noted in the final question section.


attached is a very poorly rendered drawing of what i saw as well as too wretched photographs that show next to nothing. the red and white lights on the actual craft were basically the same size, but my rather deplorable drawing skills (it was an online drawing program), do not reflect that. the large thing at the front was the very bright light.
content.summary: Diamond-shaped craft over bayfield, co

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in an outdoor hot tub with a friend, at roughly 3:15 pm, on the deck of a house 30 feet from the beach. i was facing east. my friend was facing north. 

i saw a bright round light come straight down from the sky, to 50 feet above the water, then make a sudden and sharp 90 degree angle, and disappear from view behind a small island. 

the light moved at incredibly fast speed, faster than anything man made. it is the only time i ever saw  anything like that.

__________________________________________________

i had another experience: i had a sense that my spirit rose out of my body, while i lay in my bed, and flew on a light beam right through the closed glass window into the future. i saw a situation that i was told about one week later. it was as if someone took my spirit into the future on a light beam, showed me something, then sent me back in time to the present. when i came back to my physical body, i saw a luminance ball of living sparkling light, that landed on my chest, and dissipated into my body. i sat up to meet the ball of light and was so shocked, i threw off my nightgown, but the light dissipated into me anyway.

__________________________________________________

i had another experience:  that i was shown a huge ship or container, with a specific handle that caused the ship/container to lift off the ground, and fly over a body of water. this was a huge anti-gravity device.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Huge ball of bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from a friend's house. it was very dark outside.
i looked up to look at the moon, looking at the stars, and, well looking for u.F.Os as i was walking.
then i saw this brilliant orange light.
it was about the height of an average air plane so that is what i thought it was at first. it only took me a good 2 seconds until i realized it was a u.F.O.
it moved at the exact pace of an air plane but after i took a picture of it with my phone (which did not come out very well)there were three lights flashing on the back side of the orange light. the colors were white, green, and blue. later there was white light flashing at the tip making out a cone shape.
i was nervous, i panicked. so i ran the rest of the way home (which was not to far away to begin with). when i got to the back door i stopped to see if it was still there but then i saw something more. next to the flying object was another flashing light that was very still but it had a very dim and thin ring around it.
i ran inside and got a digital camera but i never used this camera before so i had trouble turning it on.
by the time i got it working i ran back out side to take a picture, but they were gone. the orange light and the still saucer.
content.summary: Slow orange light with flashing lights making cone shape

content.detailedDescription:
Ashburn, virginia
8:50-9:00pm
monday, may 9th 2011

i was leaving work at around 8:50pm and noticed a group of people out in the employee parking lot. i walked over to them and one of them told me to look in the sky to the west. i looked and was amazed to see a arch of lights in the sky, obviously flying crafts of some kind. i first thought they were planes, being that dulles airport is about 8 miles away.  i asked if anyone had a video camera or phone, as mine was out of batteries. there were 2 short videos shot, one of them is attached, the other i am waiting to get from someone else that was there.

the person that took this video had already been watching the lights for 10 minutes before i arrived, with no change in formation, just remaining a steady arch in the sky.

i stayed for another 3-4 minutes watching in awe and then the arch broke into 2 seperate small bundled formations with a bright light seperating the two. the lights were white and the center light appeared to be changing colors from redish to white. i watched this for about 5 more minutes and got into my car to go home. one thing that i did notice was that there was no air traffic in the sky.

while driving home, i could see the lights in my rear view mirror. by that time there were only 2 visible and they dimmed away.

i have no idea what we saw, if the military was doing training or if they were helicoptors in a formation. all i know is that it was really odd and after being in the marines for 5 years, i have never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Arch of lights on the western horizon.

content.detailedDescription: My first incounter was last year (10-2010) it was at night, around 11:30pm and i was in bed watching tv and the blinds was open because i like to see the airplanes flyn by. everytime a airplane go by; i would look out the windows and when i saw these lights, i thought it was a airplane, until i got up and looked out the window and saw an ufo flickering, white, blue, green, red, purple, a yellowish orange color and then it turned completly black. it was right in the back of my house, just in the air. i grab my camera in starting taken pictures and filmimg it. i woke my husband, sister and my neice up; to come in wittnes what im seeing. i wasnt scared at all, it just seem so crazy because; even do the air force; tries to tell you, that not a such thing! then you see it with your own eyes, is a blessing. i dont know why it choose to stop behind my house but it did. ive been taking pictures and recording since then. i have over 80-pictures and around 30 recordings. they know im taking pictures and recording of them! sometime they'll put on a good show. i've notice right after that, everywhere i went; i will see as ther appear; looking like a star; they will follow. about a month ago, i was on my way home in seen one by the moon and i wanted to take a picture of it, and i really couldnt get a good picture, so i continue to try to focus on it, and the process i started to take the camera, everywhere i saw particiles, which lead down to the ground and right infront of my window. about an hour later, i got in the bed, then an the corner of my eyes, i saw what looked like a white piece of glitter going by me. i asked my husband to turn off the lights, so i can see better. i took pictures that night and recorded what i caught; little balls was coming out everywhere. sometimes i know their is there without turning on my camera and i took picture last night and recorded; outside and in my room and there they was. i'm not scared, but i do want to know, whats goin on. i'm asking for help; because this truely mean something. thank you
content.shape: Boomerang,   Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Cross,   Diamond,   Egg,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: They look like stars but there not! they change colors as well as shapes

content.detailedDescription: The video i have attached explains the story. everyone should see this video!
content.summary: Orb in the sky flashing colors

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in the backyard hot tub, around midnight, when we saw bright blue and red lights in the sky. no actually craft was seen in the darkness. it came in toward our neighborhood, near the house, hovered silently, circled around silently and then dropped straight down at a very fast rate of speed. it then went away from our neighborhood toward the open space behind our house, where we lost sight of it over the neighbor houses. it wasn't a plane or a helicopter. my husband and i are in our eighties and we've seen many things in life. we aren't people that scare easily, but this definitely instilled a sense of fear, like we'd seen something out of the ordinary.
content.summary: Silent red and blue lights, hovering, circling then dropping fast

content.detailedDescription:
I have a balcony on my third story apartment and my mom hates smoking so i always go out there to smoke butts. the first time i saw them was a little after we moved in, and i was outside smoking, looking at the stars, when i saw three balls of light on the horizon. there are trees for acres behind my building with street lamps here and there where the road cuts into the woods, and there are mountains where they seemed to be. i passed them off as stars at first (or street lamps, or radio towers, of which there are a couple next to where i see them, but as you will read, the lights are not always there, so it cannot possibly be any of those), until i saw the third one on the far right begin to move away from the others. they seemed to be glowing/flashing different colors (red, blue, white, purple and not at certain points like the corners of a triangle, the entire sphere was morphing into these colors). so the one on the right was moving away from the group and thats when it started to get weird. the orb that was moving stopped and just hovered for a little while going up and down repeatedly, sometimes making circular motions. the one on the far left began to do the same thing, but the center orb remained stationary. i watched this continue for a good long while before i just went inside. this was not my only encounter with these orbs. ever since that first night, i have repeatedly seen them in the same general area doing the same thing and have had friends witness it as well. one of those times with my friend we actually saw one of the three light up immensely becoming the brightest object in the sky, then immediately disappear. that same night a red light that looked like a circular spotlight flashed very quick on the top of the trees in front of us while we were watching the orbs. it wasnt an object, just a quick flash on top of a couple of trees maybe 200-300 yards in front of us. all of this is usually late at night, around 12-3am. they also seem to have some kind of secondary orb that comes out from the bottom that is maybe a third of their size and sits a short distance beneath them and then joining back up with the main body. they are not always on the horizon, however, occasionally there is only one or two to my not too distant left moving behind the tree line very, very, slowly and never making any sounds whatsoever. 
on another occasion, i got to see what i believe was possibly one of these secondary smaller orbs actually in the woods in front of my balcony (this is giving me chills just thinking about it, i was very afraid that night, i didnt sleep at all). i was watching the usual group of three (who i have concluded cannot be stars because it can be weeks before i see them again) when i saw a faint white light off in the distance in my woods. now, my apartment building is on a cliff, so to say, with about a 30 foot drop to where there are some tall grasses before it eventually turns into thick wood. these woods go up around the cliff to the left and up to the parking lot in the front of the building, so there is access to these woods without making a 30 foot jump. so i saw the light, and then it just went away and i didnt think much about it until i saw it again a few moments later, but closer. this time it didnt disappear but continued moving, very slowly, maybe 10-20 ft. from the ground. i could see it moving behind the branches, and i just froze. i dont think it was a person with a flashlight, because it wasnt bobbing up and down like some one walking, nor was it scanning back and forth. and it didnt have rays or a cone of light like a flashlight, it was just one orb of light that was only glowing, not emitting any kind of rays (or sound for that matter) of any sort, like the kind you see when squinting looking at a light bulb or something. it was very small too. eventually it moved off to my left where the trail starts and goes up the cliff to meet with the parking lot. there is a good 40 yards of trail there, so i never saw it break the tree line, it just sort of disappeared from sight. 
and me and my friends are not the only ones to have seen this. my father and his friend once were drinking on the balcony and saw all three of them moving across the sky during the day. i have yet to see them at any other time but night, but i usually dont get home until late anyways. i haven't captured any of this on film because we simply don't own any cameras with the ability to capture anything at night. our one camera is completely useless in the dark. 
everytime i see these objects i end up just going inside after a while because i see them so often and because i have nothing to capture them on. it has been perhaps a month, month and a half since my last sighting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple ufos multiple times

content.detailedDescription:
As these transformers blow if you look in the sky and at about one minute and 55 seconds into this you will some orbs not sure what to make of it but would like someone else to comment on it to see what they think.  not sure if it is just from the transformers but it the only time you see them and they appear to move.


*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: Power transformers began to explode. one by one the transformers lit-up in an unbelievable chain reaction that lasted about thirty minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside on a saturday looked up and seen something . i grabed my camara and started taping . i tried to zoom in even closer at end of this taping and my camara went out of focus .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo pulsing over ridgecrest ca.

content.detailedDescription:
On 5/9/2011 i was sitting on my porch facing se around 10:00 pm eastern time.  and in the sky appeared a light probably half the size of a full moon in the shape of a circle, it was a whitish yellowish mix in color.  to the left of it appeared another one exactly the same and also another to the right also exactly the same, within seconds the middle one split into two separate ���balls��� and then the one to the left did the same thing and then the right to follow, i jumped and ran to the door to call for a friend to come and see and when i turned around they were all gone.  as we sat on the porch and i was stressing to her what i had just witnessed i saw another one in the same area in the sky i pointed and just freaked out as did she when she turned around and witnessed it also.. but this time it was just one and it never split.
	also that night my dogs, as well as the neighbor���s dogs were barking and going crazy.  we also heard faint unusual noises for where we live, one sounded like a screaming baby, and the other was hard to explain, almost like a ���shuttering��� sound.  i am not trying to be funny but it almost sounded like that ���clucking��� noise the ���creatures��� on the movie signs made, i���m serious.  during this time my noaa weather radio kept going off for no reason, there were no watches, or warnings in our area at all.  this was a very unsettling situation...
content.summary: Three balls of light quickly split

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside looking up at the stars because i couldn't sleep when i say a v-shaped formation fly over my house. at first i thought it was birds but quickly realized it was a craft. it at first looked black with lights in the v shape on it's underside. it was completely silent and flying really low, seemed well below the clouds. it was heading east from the coast - as it was right above and over to the left, i couldn't tell if there was a craft under it because the lights seemed to distort. as it flew over the garage it was out of the line of sight. i was stunned for a second then i got up from the bench from where i was sitting and walked over the 10 feet to look where it was going and it was gone. clearly, this was absolutely not any kind of optical illusion - it was a craft.
content.summary: Black silent plane with v-shaped lights

content.detailedDescription: Affidavit of anonymous witness covering several incidents in several states.

On april 1st 2011 at about 1:30 a.M. i just got done watching a movie. i was about to watch another movie. i stepped outside on my back porch to have a smoke before the next movie.It was a clear night no clouds you could see all the stars. it was just a beautiful night. as i was standing on my back porch i was looking down at the ground and i see lights reflecting on the ground. and i have never seen lights reflecting off the ground before when i was standing on my porch at night. so i thought that was kind of funny. and i have lived in this house for many years. so to see lights reflecting off the ground was not normal. anyway i look up to see what the lights were i see up in the sky 2 oval shape amber colered lights that were pulsing in the middle was a small round light it was orange the orange light was not pulsing it stayed bright orange the whole time. it was moving real slow. i watched this thing for about 5 seconds then it was like someone turned off a light switch and it was gone. i was so triped out by this thing that i called one of the local news stations later that moring and ask to speak to someone in the metorology. i asked the person i spoke to if anyone had called in about any thing strange. and he told me he had just got in and had not had a chance to look over anything. i asked him if i could call back later and he said yes. but i never called back. the thing i saw was kind of big and it was nothing i have ever saw i know it was not from this world. and it was not any kind of natural phenomenon. like i said it was a clear night and this thing it was like someone turned on a light because there was nothing around this thing when it came on or when it went off. and it was flying real slow and there was no noise coming from this thing. it was the strangest thing i have ever seen in all my life i am 49 years old. now ever time i go out onto my back porch to have a smoke at night i find myself looking up at that same spot hoping it will show itself again. but i know that it was more then likly a one time deal. but it is something i will never forget
content.summary: Pulsing amber lights with small orange light in middle

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside smoking a cigarette and looked up as always, noticed nothing out of the ordinary due to overcast.  walked over to shut my shed door, where the street lights were blocked by the shed and noticed 2 very bright white in color lights dancing above the clouds south, south east of my location.  i of course stopped and watched for a pattern to rule out search lights or event lights such as a theater spotlight or a "batman" spotlight if you will.  and noticed the brightness of these objects would fluctuate no matter the distance.  i.E. instead of fading as they danced further away, they would almost pulse.  get brighter going further away, more dim getting closer, then switch. get very bright up close and dim far away.  there were absolutely no patterns to these lights at all.  they would move very fast and slow a bit, then one would speed up and the other seemed to follow to match this.  an absolutely brilliant pulsating light.  strangest thing of all was my loss of cell phone signal and the phone itself wouldnt function for me to allocate my camera setting.  when it finally worked, the lights were gone and i had nothing but my fiancee' to support this claim.  we both her a very distinct humming sound and then the sound of jets flying over.  again, you can check the weather.  it's solid overcast but the jets sounded like it was literally ripping the sky apart.  which would make me believe they were using afterburners.  we have military bases to the east and south of us.  and there have been an increasing amount of military presence here the past few weeks.  since then we've seen strange things, tonight being the strangest of them all..Especially with the presence of military force in a town with 5,000 people in it...White oak, texas.  i've never seen a ufo, never claimed to see a ufo.  all i have claimed to see tonight are 2 very bright, pulsating white lights dancing in the sky above the cloud layer.  then at 1:00am hearing at least 1 jet with afterburners active.  i'll leave this with you to decipher the accuracy of the claim.  thank you for you time.  *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg)
content.summary: Dancing lights above the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
Mufon investigator submitted this report on behalf of reporting witness. witness submitted e-mails to mufon after posting a may 4th sighting description on a local topix.Com form: the following was stated in the form by the witness: 

may 4, 2011 at 9:25 pm "something" was out in the posey township boonies flying around, silent. very bright sphere. came in from the south. slowed down down, then headed southeast in a zig-zagging motion (no pun intended) i even sent an email to certain friends just in case it was observed by someone else. like above, let er' rip. 

the form gererated several supportive as well as negative comments. in e-mails to mufon the witness wrote:
 
just in case something is said about people seeing something bright in the sky about 9:25-9:35 tonight, i saw it. came from the south, light went dead for about 30 seconds, then bright again heading se. no sound. it was not a plane. laugh, whatever but it was something.

and:

i sent this email as a backup incase someone saw what i did, it worked.

and:

i am close to wright pat. afb. saw a cigar shaped, purple lights back in 1969. was documented in a paper called the eastern indiana farmer. glad, because dad thought i was nuts. (senior in hs).

this was shaped like a sphere, white light,not a beam or anything, not red. it stopped above the house, then left in a zig-zig motion, then gone. i am 59/60 (july). like they all say, i know what i saw.

that is why i sent the email, for a backup.
content.summary: Bright white orb
